mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupstudy_member ( groupstudy_member_no, study_no, email, study_role, diligence_score, participation_score, participation_reason, determination, approval_flag ) VALUES ( seq_groupstudy_member_no.NEXTVAL, #{study.studyNo}, #{member.email}, #{studyRole}, #{diligenceScore:NUMERIC}, #{participationScore:NUMERIC}, #{participationReason}, #{determination}, #{approvalFlag:VARCHAR} )
